title: Act 1936 (No. 48 of 1936) (as adapted by the Justice and Equality (Alteration of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) 

Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 30 August 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited district court (fees) (amendment) order 2021 (2) order come operation 30 august 2021

title: Act 1936 (No. 48 of 1936) (as adapted by the Justice and Equality (Alteration of
heading: 2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended
text_raw:
2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) is amended 
by the substitution of the following Articles for Articles 4A and 4B (inserted by 
Article 2 of the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 439 of 
2020))– 

“4A. Notwithstanding Article 2, no fee shall be payable under this Order in 
the year 2021 in respect of the items specified in column (1) of Part 4 of the 
Schedule at the following reference numbers: 

(a) 4 (On an application for a certificate of transfer of a licence); 

(b) 8 (On an application for a General Exemption Order); 

(c) 

16a (On an application for a restaurant certificate or a limited 
restaurant certificate); 

(d) 18 (On an application for a certificate of registration of a club); 

(e) 

22 (On an application for any other public dancing licence); 

(f) 

23 (On an application for a music and singing licence). 

4B. Notwithstanding Article 2, no fee shall be payable under this Order in 
the year 2021 in respect of the item specified, at reference number 5 (On the 
issue of a certificate of renewal of a licence), in column (1) of Part 4 of the 
Schedule where the licence in respect of which the certificate of renewal is issued 
is a spirit retailer’s on-licence.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

[444] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 August, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 August, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [444]

title: Act 1936 (No. 48 of 1936) (as adapted by the Justice and Equality (Alteration of
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the District Court (Fees) Order 2014 ( S.I. No. 22 of 2014 ) 
in order to provide that no fee shall be payable in the year 2021 in respect of 
certain items.
